stud.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the use of animals, especially horses, for breeding, an animal that is used in this way, or a place where this is done
stud.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a man who has a lot of sexual partners and who is very proud of his sexual ability
stud.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: one of a set of small pointed pieces of metal or plastic that are attached to the bottom of a running shoe, football boot etc to stop you from slipping
stud.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: a round piece of metal that is stuck into a surface for decoration
stud.translation[0].definitions[5].defin: a small thing for fastening a shirt or collar, that consists of two round flat pieces of metal joined together by a bar
stud.translation[0].definitions[6].defin: a board that is used to make the frame of a house
